1 /**
  2  * @fileOverview This is the main file for the simplesmtp library to create custom SMTP servers
  3  * @author <a href="mailto:andris@node.ee">Andris Reinman</a>
  4  * @version 0.1.2
  5  */
  6 
  7 var RAIServer = require("rai").RAIServer,
  8     EventEmitter = require('events').EventEmitter,
  9     oslib = require('os'),
 10     tlslib = require("tls"),
 11     utillib = require("util"),
 12     dnslib = require("dns");
 13 
 14 // expose to the world
 15 module.exports = function(options){
 16     return new SMTPServer(options);
 17 };
 18 
 19 /**
 20  * <p>Constructs a SMTP server</p>
 21  * 
 22  * <p>Possible options are:</p>
 23  * 
 24  * <ul>
 25  *     <li><b>name</b> - the hostname of the server, will be used for
 26  *         informational messages</li>
 27  *     <li><b>debug</b> - if set to true, print out messages about the connection</li>
 28  *     <li><b>timeout</b> - client timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 60 000</li>
 29  *     <li><b>secureConnection</b> - start a server on secure connection</li>
 30  *     <li><b>SMTPBanner</b> - greeting banner that is sent to the client on connection</li>
 31  *     <li><b>requireAuthentication</b> - if set to true, require that the client
 32  *         must authenticate itself</li>
 33  *     <li><b>validateSender</b> - if set to true, emit <code>'validateSender'</code>
 34  *         with <code>email</code> and <code>callback</code> when the client
 35  *         enters <code>MAIL FROM:<address></code></li>
 36  *     <li><b>validateRecipients</b> - if set to true, emit <code>'validateRecipient'</code>
 37  *         with <code>email</code> and <code>callback</code> when the client
 38  *         enters <code>RCPT TO:<address></code></li>
 39  *     <li><b>maxSize</b> - maximum size of an e-mail in bytes</li>
 40  *     <li><b>credentials</b> - TLS credentials</li>
 41  *     <li><b>authMethods</b> - allowed authentication methods, defaults to <code>["PLAIN", "LOGIN"]</code></li>
 42  *     <li><b>disableEHLO</b> - if set, support HELO only</li>
 43  * </ul>
 44  * 
 45  * @constructor
 46  * @namespace SMTP Server module
 47  * @param {Object} [options] Options object
 48  */
 49 function SMTPServer(options){
 50     EventEmitter.call(this);
 51     
 52     this.options = options || {};
 53     this.options.name = this.options.name || (oslib.hostname && oslib.hostname()) ||
 54                (oslib.getHostname && oslib.getHostname()) ||
 55                "127.0.0.1";
 56 
 57     this.options.authMethods = (this.options.authMethods || ["PLAIN", "LOGIN"]).map(
 58         function(auth){
 59             return auth.toUpperCase().trim();
 60         });
 61     
 62     this.options.disableEHLO = !!this.options.disableEHLO;
 63 
 64     this.SMTPServer = new RAIServer({
 65         secureConnection: !!this.options.secureConnection,
 66         timeout: this.options.timeout || 60*1000,
 67         disconnectOnTimeout: false,
 68         debug: !!this.options.debug
 69     });
 70     
 71     this.SMTPServer.on("connect", this._createSMTPServerConnection.bind(this));
 72 }
 73 utillib.inherits(SMTPServer, EventEmitter);
 74 
 75 /**
 76  * Server starts listening on defined port and hostname
 77  * 
 78  * @param {Number} port The port number to listen
 79  * @param {String} [host] The hostname to listen
 80  * @param {Function} callback The callback function to run when the server is listening
 81  */
 82 SMTPServer.prototype.listen = function(port, host, callback){
 83     this.SMTPServer.listen(port, host, callback);
 84 };
 85 
 86 /**
 87  * <p>Closes the server</p>
 88  * 
 89  * @param {Function} callback The callback function to run when the server is closed
 90  */
 91 SMTPServer.prototype.end = function(callback){
 92     this.SMTPServer.end(callback);
 93 };
 94 
 95 /**
 96  * <p>Creates a new {@link SMTPServerConnection} object and links the main server with
 97  * the client socket</p>
 98  * 
 99  * @param {Object} client RAISocket object to a client
100  */
101 SMTPServer.prototype._createSMTPServerConnection = function(client){
102     new SMTPServerConnection(this, client);
103 };
104 
105 /**
106  * <p>Sets up a handler for the connected client</p>
107  * 
108  * <p>Restarts the state and sets up event listeners for client actions</p>
109  * 
110  * @constructor
111  * @param {Object} server {@link SMTPServer} instance
112  * @param {Object} client RAISocket instance for the client
113  */
114 function SMTPServerConnection(server, client){
115     this.server = server;
116     this.client = client;
117 
118     this.init();
119 
120     if(this.server.options.debug){
121         console.log("Connection from", this.client.remoteAddress);
122     }
123     
124     this.client.on("timeout", this._onTimeout.bind(this));
125     this.client.on("error", this._onError.bind(this));
126     this.client.on("command", this._onCommand.bind(this));
127     this.client.on("end", this._onEnd.bind(this));
128     
129     this.client.on("data", this._onData.bind(this));
130     this.client.on("ready", this._onDataReady.bind(this));
131     
132     // Send the greeting banner
133     this.client.send("220 "+this.server.options.name+" "+(this.server.options.SMTPBanner || "ESMTP node.js simplesmtp"));
134 }
135 
136 /**
137  * <p>Reset the envelope state</p>
138  * 
139  * <p>If <code>keepAuthData</code> is set to true, then doesn't remove
140  * authentication data</p>
141  * 
142  * @param {Boolean} [keepAuthData=false] If set to true keep authentication data
143  */
144 SMTPServerConnection.prototype.init = function(keepAuthData){
145     this.envelope = {from: "", to:[], date: new Date()};
146     
147     if(this.hostnamehostNameAppearsAs){
148         this.envelope.host = this.hostNameAppearsAs;
149     }
150     
151     if(this.client.remoteAddress){
152         this.envelope.remoteAddress = this.client.remoteAddress;
153     }
154     
155     if(!keepAuthData){
156         this.authentication = {
157             username: false,
158             authenticated: false,
159             state: "NORMAL"
160         };
161     }
162 };
163 
164 /**
165  * <p>Sends a message to the client and closes the connection</p>
166  * 
167  * @param {String} [message] if set, send it to the client before disconnecting
168  */
169 SMTPServerConnection.prototype.end = function(message){
170     if(message){
171         this.client.send(message);
172     }
173     this.client.end();
174 };
175 
176 /**
177  * <p>Will be called when the connection to the client is closed</p>
178  * 
179  * @event
180  */
181 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onEnd = function(){
182     if(this.server.options.debug){
183         console.log("Connection closed to", this.client.remoteAddress);
184     }
185 };
186 
187 /**
188  * <p>Will be called when timeout occurs</p>
189  * 
190  * @event
191  */
192 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onTimeout = function(){
193     this.end("421 4.4.2 "+this.server.options.name+" Error: timeout exceeded");
194 };
195 
196 /**
197  * <p>Will be called when an error occurs</p>
198  * 
199  * @event
200  */
201 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onError = function(){
202     this.end("421 4.4.2 "+this.server.options.name+" Error: client error");
203 };
204 
205 /**
206  * <p>Will be called when a command is received from the client</p>
207  * 
208  * <p>If there's curently an authentication process going on, route
209  * the data to <code>_handleAuthLogin</code>, otherwise act as
210  * defined</p>
211  * 
212  * @event
213  * @param {String} command Command
214  * @param {Buffer} command Payload related to the command
215  */
216 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommand = function(command, payload){
217 
218     if(this.authentication.state == "AUTHENTICATING"){
219         this._handleAuthLogin(command);
220         return;
221     }
222     
223     switch((command || "").toString().trim().toUpperCase()){
224         
225         // Should not occur too often 
226         case "HELO":
227             this._onCommandHELO(payload.toString("utf-8").trim());
228             break;
229             
230         // Lists server capabilities
231         case "EHLO":
232             if(!this.server.options.disableEHLO){
233                 this._onCommandEHLO(payload.toString("utf-8").trim());
234             }else{
235                 this.client.send("502 5.5.2 Error: command not recognized");
236             }
237             break;
238             
239         // Closes the connection
240         case "QUIT":
241             this.end("221 2.0.0 Goodbye!");
242             break;
243 
244         // Resets the current state
245         case "RSET":
246             this._onCommandRSET();
247             break;
248         
249         // Doesn't work for spam related purposes
250         case "VRFY":
251             this.end("252 2.1.5 Send some mail, I'll try my best");
252             break;
253         
254         // Initiate an e-mail by defining a sender
255         case "MAIL":
256             this._onCommandMAIL(payload.toString("utf-8").trim());
257             break;
258         
259         // Add recipients to the e-mail envelope
260         case "RCPT":
261             this._onCommandRCPT(payload.toString("utf-8").trim());
262             break;
263         
264         // Authenticate if needed
265         case "AUTH":
266             this._onCommandAUTH(payload);
267             break;
268         
269         // Start accepting binary data stream
270         case "DATA":
271             this._onCommandDATA();
272             break;
273         
274         // Upgrade connection to secure TLS
275         case "STARTTLS":
276             this._onCommandSTARTTLS();
277             break;
278             
279         // Display an error on anything else
280         default:
281             this.client.send("502 5.5.2 Error: command not recognized");
282     }  
283 };
284 
285 /**
286  * <p>Initiate an e-mail by defining a sender.</p>
287  * 
288  * <p>This doesn't work if authorization is required but the client is
289  * not logged in yet.</p>
290  * 
291  * <p>If <code>validateSender</code> option is set to true, then emits
292  * <code>'validateSender'</code> and wait for the callback before moving
293  * on</p>
294  * 
295  * @param {String} mail Address payload in the form of "FROM:<address>"
296  */
297 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandMAIL = function(mail){
298     var match, email, domain;
299     
300     if(!this.hostNameAppearsAs){
301         return this.client.send("503 5.5.1 Error: send HELO/EHLO first");
302     }
303     
304     if(this.server.options.requireAuthentication && !this.authentication.authenticated){
305         return this.client.send("530 5.5.1 Authentication Required");
306     }
307     
308     if(this.envelope.from){
309         return this.client.send("503 5.5.1 Error: nested MAIL command");
310     }
311     
312     if(!(match = mail.match(/^from\:\s*<([^@>]+\@([^@>]+))>$/i))){
313         return this.client.send("501 5.1.7 Bad sender address syntax");
314     }
315     
316     email = match[1] || "";
317     domain = (match[2] || "").toLowerCase();
318     
319     dnslib.resolveMx(domain, (function(err, addresses){
320         if(err || !addresses || !addresses.length){
321             return this.client.send("450 4.1.8 <"+email+">: Sender address rejected: Domain not found");
322         }
323         
324         if(this.server.options.validateSender){
325             this.server.emit("validateSender", email, (function(err){
326                 if(err){
327                     return this.client.send("550 5.1.1 <"+email+">: Sender address rejected: User unknown in local sender table");
328                 }
329                 
330                 // force domain part to be lowercase
331                 email = email.substr(0, email.length - domain.length) + domain;
332                 this.envelope.from = email;
333                 this.client.send("250 2.1.0 Ok");
334         
335             }).bind(this));
336         }else{
337             // force domain part to be lowercase
338             email = email.substr(0, email.length - domain.length) + domain;
339             this.envelope.from = email;
340             this.client.send("250 2.1.0 Ok");
341         }
342     }).bind(this));  
343 };
344 
345 /**
346  * <p>Add recipients to the e-mail envelope</p>
347  * 
348  * <p>This doesn't work if <code>MAIL</code> command is not yet executed</p>
349  * 
350  * <p>If <code>validateRecipients</code> option is set to true, then emits
351  * <code>'validateRecipient'</code> and wait for the callback before moving
352  * on</p>
353  * 
354  * @param {String} mail Address payload in the form of "TO:<address>"
355  */
356 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandRCPT = function(mail){
357     var match, email, domain;
358     
359     if(!this.envelope.from){
360         return this.client.send("503 5.5.1 Error: need MAIL command");
361     }
362     
363     if(!(match = mail.match(/^to\:\s*<([^@>]+\@([^@>]+))>$/i))){
364         return this.client.send("501 5.1.7 Bad recipient address syntax");
365     }
366     
367     email = match[1] || "";
368     domain = (match[2] || "").toLowerCase();
369     
370     dnslib.resolveMx(domain, (function(err, addresses){
371         if(err || !addresses || !addresses.length){
372             return this.client.send("450 4.1.8 <"+email+">: Recipient address rejected: Domain not found");
373         }
374         
375         if(this.server.options.validateRecipients){
376             this.server.emit("validateRecipient", email, (function(err){
377                 if(err){
378                     return this.client.send("550 5.1.1 <"+email+">: Recipient address rejected: User unknown in local recipient table");
379                 }
380                 
381                 // force domain part to be lowercase
382                 email = email.substr(0, email.length - domain.length) + domain;
383                 
384                 // add to recipients list
385                 if(this.envelope.to.indexOf(email)<0){
386                     this.envelope.to.push(email);
387                 }
388                 this.client.send("250 2.1.0 Ok");
389             }).bind(this));
390         }else{
391             // force domain part to be lowercase
392             email = email.substr(0, email.length - domain.length) + domain;
393             
394             // add to recipients list
395             if(this.envelope.to.indexOf(email)<0){
396                 this.envelope.to.push(email);
397             }
398             this.client.send("250 2.1.0 Ok");
399         }
400     }).bind(this));  
401 };
402 
403 /**
404  * <p>Switch to data mode and starts waiting for a binary data stream. Emits
405  * <code>'startData'</code>.</p>
406  * 
407  * <p>If <code>RCPT</code> is not yet run, stop</p>
408  */
409 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandDATA = function(){
410     
411     if(!this.envelope.to.length){
412         return this.client.send("503 5.5.1 Error: need RCPT command");
413     }
414     
415     this.client.startDataMode();
416     this.client.send("354 End data with <CR><LF>.<CR><LF>");
417     this.server.emit("startData", this.envelope);
418 };
419 
420 /**
421  * <p>Resets the current state - e-mail data and authentication info</p>
422  */
423 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandRSET = function(){
424     this.init();
425     this.client.send("250 2.0.0 Ok");
426 };
427 
428 /**
429  * <p>If the server is in secure connection mode, start the authentication
430  * process. Param <code>payload</code> defines the authentication mechanism.</p>
431  * 
432  * <p>Currently supported - PLAIN and LOGIN. There is no need for more
433  * complicated mechanisms (different CRAM versions etc.) since authentication
434  * is only done in secure connection mode</p>
435  * 
436  * @param {Buffer} payload Defines the authentication mechanism
437  */
438 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandAUTH = function(payload){
439     var method;
440     
441     if(!this.server.options.requireAuthentication){
442         return this.client.send("503 5.5.1 Error: authentication not enabled");
443     }
444     
445     if(!this.client.secureConnection){
446         return this.client.send("530 5.7.0 Must issue a STARTTLS command first");
447     }
448     
449     if(this.authentication.authenticated){
450         return this.client.send("503 5.7.0 No identity changes permitted");
451     }
452     
453     payload = payload.toString("utf-8").trim().split(" ");
454     method = payload.shift().trim().toUpperCase();
455     
456     if(this.server.options.authMethods.indexOf(method)<0){
457         return this.client.send("535 5.7.8 Error: authentication failed: no mechanism available");
458     }
459     
460     switch(method){
461         case "PLAIN":
462             this._handleAuthPlain(payload);
463             break;
464         case "LOGIN":
465             this._handleAuthLogin();
466             break;
467     }
468 };
469 
470 /**
471  * <p>Upgrade the connection to a secure TLS connection</p>
472  */
473 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandSTARTTLS = function(){
474     if(this.client.secureConnection){
475         return this.client.send("554 5.5.1 Error: TLS already active");
476     }
477     
478     this.client.send("220 2.0.0 Ready to start TLS");
479     
480     this.client.startTLS(this.server.options.credentials, (function(){
481         // Connection secured
482         // nothing to do here, since it is the client that should 
483         // make the next move
484     }).bind(this));
485 };
486 
487 /**
488  * <p>Retrieve hostname from the client. Not very important, since client
489  * IP is already known and the client can send fake data</p>
490  * 
491  * @param {String} host Hostname of the client
492  */
493 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandHELO = function(host){
494     if(!host){
495         return this.client.send("501 Syntax: EHLO hostname");
496     }else{
497         this.hostNameAppearsAs = host;
498         this.envelope.host = host;
499     }
500     this.client.send("250 "+this.server.options.name+" at your service, ["+
501         this.client.remoteAddress+"]");
502 };
503 
504 /**
505  * <p>Retrieve hostname from the client. Not very important, since client
506  * IP is already known and the client can send fake data</p>
507  * 
508  * <p>Additionally displays server capability list to the client</p>
509  * 
510  * @param {String} host Hostname of the client 
511  */
512 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onCommandEHLO = function(host){
513     var response = [this.server.options.name+" at your service, ["+
514         this.client.remoteAddress+"]", "8BITMIME", "ENHANCEDSTATUSCODES"];
515     
516     if(this.server.options.maxSize){
517         response.push("SIZE "+this.server.options.maxSize);
518     }
519     
520     if(this.client.secureConnection && this.server.options.requireAuthentication){
521         response.push("AUTH "+this.server.options.authMethods.join(" "));
522         response.push("AUTH="+this.server.options.authMethods.join(" "));
523     }
524     
525     if(!this.client.secureConnection){
526         response.push("STARTTLS");
527     }
528     
529     if(!host){
530         return this.client.send("501 Syntax: EHLO hostname");
531     }else{
532         this.hostNameAppearsAs = host;
533         this.envelope.host = host;
534     }
535     
536     this.client.send(response.map(function(feature, i, arr){
537         return "250"+(i<arr.length-1?"-":" ")+feature;
538     }).join("\r\n"));    
539 };
540 
541 /**
542  * <p>Detect login information from the payload and initiate authentication
543  * by emitting <code>'authorizeUser'</code> and waiting for its callback</p>
544  * 
545  * @param {Buffer} payload AUTH PLAIN login information
546  */
547 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._handleAuthPlain = function(payload){
548     var userdata = new Buffer(payload.join(" "), "base64"), password;
549     userdata = userdata.toString("utf-8").split("\u0000");
550     this.authentication.username = userdata[1] || userdata[0] || "";
551     password = userdata[2] || "";
552     
553     this.server.emit("authorizeUser", 
554         this.envelope, 
555         this.authentication.username, 
556         password, 
557         (function(err, success){
558             if(err || !success){
559                 this.authentication.authenticated = false;
560                 this.authentication.username = false;
561                 this.authentication.state = "NORMAL";
562                 return this.client.send("535 5.7.8 Error: authentication failed: generic failure");
563             }
564             this.client.send("235 2.7.0 Authentication successful");
565             this.authentication.authenticated = true;
566             this.authentication.state = "AUTHENTICATED";
567         }).bind(this));
568 };
569 
570 /**
571  * <p>Sets authorization state to "AUTHENTICATING" and reuqests for the
572  * username and password from the client</p>
573  * 
574  * <p>If username and password are set initiate authentication
575  * by emitting <code>'authorizeUser'</code> and waiting for its callback</p>
576  * 
577  * @param {Buffer} payload AUTH LOGIN login information
578  */
579 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._handleAuthLogin = function(payload){
580     if(this.authentication.state == "NORMAL"){
581         this.authentication.state = "AUTHENTICATING";
582         this.client.send("334 VXNlcm5hbWU6");
583     }else if(this.authentication.state == "AUTHENTICATING"){
584         if(this.authentication.username === false){
585             this.authentication.username = new Buffer(payload, "base64").toString("utf-8");
586             this.client.send("334 UGFzc3dvcmQ6");
587         }else{
588             this.authentication.state = "VERIFYING";
589             this.server.emit("authorizeUser", 
590                 this.envelope, 
591                 this.authentication.username, 
592                 new Buffer(payload, "base64").toString("utf-8"), 
593                 (function(err, success){
594                     if(err || !success){
595                         this.authentication.authenticated = false;
596                         this.authentication.username = false;
597                         this.authentication.state = "NORMAL";
598                         return this.client.send("535 5.7.8 Error: authentication failed: generic failure");
599                     }
600                     this.client.send("235 2.7.0 Authentication successful");
601                     this.authentication.authenticated = true;
602                     this.authentication.state = "AUTHENTICATED";
603                 }).bind(this));
604         }
605         
606     }
607 };
608 
609 /**
610  * <p>Emits the data received from the client with <code>'data'</code>
611  * 
612  * @event
613  * @param {Buffer} chunk Binary data sent by the client on data mode
614  */
615 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onData = function(chunk){
616     this.server.emit("data", this.envelope, chunk);
617 };
618 
619 /**
620  * <p>If the data stream ends, emit <code>'dataReady'</code>and wait for
621  * the callback.</p>
622  * 
623  * @event
624  */
625 SMTPServerConnection.prototype._onDataReady = function(){
626     this.server.emit("dataReady", this.envelope, (function(err, code){
627         this.init(true); //reset state, keep auth data
628         
629         if(err){
630             this.client.send("550 FAILED");
631         }else{
632             this.client.send("250 2.0.0 Ok: queued as "+(code || "FOOBARBAZ"));
633         }
634         
635     }).bind(this));
636 };
637
